info.title: Interhome Group Distribution API
info.description:
The Webservices have been developed for Interhome Group using a REST-approach.

## Endpoint-URLs Format
[Base URL][REST route][Selectors][Query parameters]

## Service URLs
Test System: https://ws.interhome.com/test/ih/b2b/V0100/

Production system: https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/

Routes, selectors and query parameters are specified below with each individual service.
## Limitation of requests
Test Environment: 50 RQ /second

Productive Environment: 200 RQ/second

Please use "Accept-Encoding: gzip" to reduce traffic.

## Scheduled downtime
Every Tuesday morning around 4:00 to 6:00 (CET), our service might be unresponsive due to system updates.

get.description:
## Description
The method returns a list of all accommodations (code, name, date of modification) with an active contract.
## Use case
This method is typically called during a nightly or weekly automated update of property data. The returned static data for the accommodation codes is afterwards updated using the *Accommodation/Details* service and is cached locally.
            
Please be aware that you should use the query parameter *ModifiedSince* to receive just the accommodation which have been updated in the following fields since your last import: *Prices*, *Accommodation/Details*. Interhome does not support any info of inactivated properties; so you need to create your own delta.
## Caching
Yes
## Timing/Duration of call
Whole portfolio: 1 second
            
With *ModifiedSince*: 3 seconds
## Examples
[https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list](https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/accommodation/list)

parameters.name: ModifiedSince
parameters.description:
Filters results to accommodations modified after a given
date. ModifiedSince can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: Brand
parameters.description: One or many specific brands

parameters.name: ModifyType
parameters.description: List of ModifyTypes to specifically search for. For example you want to check every 5 minutes for changes on availability then use 'VACANCY' (see LastModifiedTypeEnum)

get.description:
## Description
The Accommodation Detail method returns all static data (descriptions, attributes, media URLs) of an accommodation.
Multiple languages can be retrieved at once by adding "Language" parameters to the URL
## Use case
This method is typically used on the property details page.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated at least weekly.

## Description
This method is a subset of the Accommodation Detail response. It returns all media URLs. Currently, only photos are supported and returned.
## Use case
It is typically used to access/update accommodation media URLs only during a nightly update.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated, at least weekly.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Amount of results per page (required, if Page, ModifiedSinceFrom or ModifiedSinceTo is set)

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Page selection (required, if PageSize, ModifiedSinceFrom or ModifiedSinceTo is set)

parameters.name: ModifiedSinceFrom
parameters.description: Start date for modified since filtering (required, if ModifiedSinceTo is set)

parameters.name: ModifiedSinceTo
parameters.description: End date for modified since filtering (required, if ModifiedSinceFrom is set)

get.description:

get.description:
## Description
Returns all services and extra costs (both mandatory and optional) for a specific property of the chosen sales currency in the selected language.
            
            
**Services that have to be paid on the spot are always returned in the destination currency, no matter which sales
currency is chosen!**
## Caching
Yes
## Use case
The services returned are typically cached in a local database.
## Timing/Duration of call
Request with a specific travel date: 150ms. Request for all travel dates: 550ms.

## Description
Returns all prices for a given duration / occupancy.  For different source markets, this request does not have to be sent per SalesOffice.
            
In that case, only the EUR prices can be imported and prices for other source markets can be calculated with the currency.xml provided on our partner ftp. This does not include source markets for India and Australia.
## Use case
- To display the cheapest price for a given duration
- To create a price matrix
- Some partners use it to provide a calendar including prices to the guests
- To import prices weekly
## Caching
It is **not allowed** to use this request to update the prices several times a day. The response of this method has to be cached and should be updated at least weekly.

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding accommodation

parameters.name: SalesOffice
parameters.description: Includes services of this Sales Office

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: Currency in which all amounts should be returned

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Duration of stay (in days)

parameters.name: PaxSplit
parameters.description: If there are different prices depending on occupancy, all will be delivered with this parameter set to true. With value false or without this parameter you only get prices for maximum occupancy.

get.summary: 2.6.1 Accommodation Price List with pax split and all durations
get.description:
## Description
Returns all prices for a given period for all durations from 1 to 28 nights. For different source markets, this request has to be sent per SalesOffice.
## Use case
- To fetch all prices for a specific accommodation
- To import prices per check-in day, duration and pax (occupancy).
## Caching
The response of this method has to be cached and should be updated once a day.

parameters.name: LOS
parameters.description: Returns vacancy checked prices only. Only instant bookable options will be returned.

parameters.name: Pax
parameters.description: Limit results to minimum pax

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Limits result to duration

parameters.name: SpecialOffer
parameters.description: Adds information about special offers (default false)

parameters.name: RangeFromDate
parameters.description: Limits results to this earliest date

parameters.name: RangeToDate
parameters.description: Limits results to this latest date

get.description:
## Description
Returns a seasonal price list as it would be printed in a catalog for a given duration (e.g. 1 week). For overlapping seasons, no price is returned.
            
In comparison to accommodation/pricelist method (2.5), this method returns one price per season/contract built in our backend system. This method takes the price of the first day in this season and returns this.
            
In general, during one season, the prices are the same, except when a special offer appears. In that case, those special offers during this contract/season will not be shown.
## Use case
It is typically used to display a price list on the property details page. It is not recommended to use this method to import the data in your own database.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated at least weekly.

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding accommodation

parameters.name: SalesOffice
parameters.description: Includes services of this Sales Office

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: Currency in which all amounts should be returned

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Duration of stay (in days)

parameters.name: PaxSplit
parameters.description: If there are different prices depending on occupancy, all will be delivered with this parameter set to true. With value false or without this parameter you only get prices for maximum occupancy.

get.description:
## Description
Returns all active travel destinations (countries, regions, places) in which Interhome Group offers accommodations.
## Use case
The destination information should be cached in a local database. It then can be used to feed data (region, place codes etc.) to the Search method.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated at least weekly.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Specify a language or get default English

get.description:
## Description
Returns all Interhome Group sales offices which accept bookings, including accepted payment methods and cancellation conditions, via API.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated at least weekly.

## Description
Returns accepted payment methods and cancellation conditions for the selected sales office, via API.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated at least weekly.

parameters.name: salesOffice
parameters.description: Select a specific SalesOffice

get.description:
## Description
This method returns the definitions (descriptions) of all available special offers. It does not return any actual prices / special offers on product base.
## Use case
Can be used to cache an overview of all available special offer Interhome Group provides.
## Timing/Duration of call
100ms

parameters.name: specialOfferCode
parameters.description: Selects a specific special offer to see the conditions of booking for that offer, you need to replace the slash in the original special offer code with '%2F'

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language of text elements. Default is English

get.description:
## Description
This method returns the definitions (descriptions) of all available special offers. It does not return any actual prices / special offers on product base.
## Use case
Can be used to cache an overview of all available special offer Interhome Group provides.
## Timing/Duration of call
100ms

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language of text elements. Default is English

get.description:
## Description
Check if a booking is generally possible for a given check-in/check-out combination.
## Use case
This method is only useful to check if a booking is generally possible. In many cases, the Check Price function (which yields the price) should be used instead.
If you just want to know if it is possible to create a reservation on this property, you receive Yes or No back and you can go forward with checkprice.
## Caching
No

post.description:
## Description
Checks if a booking is possible and returns the final price along with all extra costs for a given check-in/check-out combination. Please be aware that CheckPriceRQ are only successful if the property has free vacancies available. If the property has no free vacancies (which you could check with vacancy/string), a 404 error is returned.
All Post Parameters have to be implemented in element BookingHeader.
Handling of extra costs and services:
* The final price returned in the response, includes all compulsory extra costs for the total duration of the stay
* The cost for any optional service, which have to be paid with the reservation and is selected in the request, is included in the customer total price.
Moreover the returned price for the optional service in the "services" section of the response is pre-calculated and refers to the total duration of the stay (no correlation to the unit in the response)
* Optional services paid on spot are not included in customer total price. Those services have to be calculated for the customer (see example in 2.4 Accommodation Services)
* If an optional service has been selected n times, it will appear n times in the response
* Only services with type N* (additional services) can be selected at time of booking
## Use case
This method is typically used on the property details page when a customer selects check-in and duration.
## Caching
No

404.description: Price could not be determined (property does not exist or has no price information)

post.description:
## Description
For this method, the format of both request and response is identical to booking/checkPrice. Additionally, to checkprice RQ, a live price is requested directly from the supplier for all third party properties.
## Use case
This method must only be used to check the price in the final stage before the booking. It is not allowed to use this method to retrieve prices in bulk!
## Timing/Duration of call
It can take up to 60 seconds before a response is generated.

404.description: Price could not be determined (property does not exist or has no price information)

get.description:
## Description
Returns the cancellation conditions for a specific sales office.
## Use case
This method is typically used during the booking process to display the cancellation conditions to the customer before the booking.
## Caching
The response of this method must be cached and updated at least weekly.

parameters.name: salesOffice
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding SalesOffice

post.description:
## Description
Send a valid Reservation POST request. The service will respond with either the new Reservation Number in case of success or error messages in case of failure.
## Use Case
Use this request to create a final booking.
## Timing/Duration of call
The reservation process can take up to 60 seconds. Therefore, it is advised to set the timeout to 60 seconds or more.

get.description:
## Description
Send a GET request with the reservation number to be read as selector.
## Use Case
With this request you get all the booking information including status of the booking.
## Timing/Duration of call
The process can take up to 60 seconds. Therefore, it is advised to set the timeout to 60 seconds or more.

delete.description:
## Description
* to cancel a reservation
* In case of success, HTTP status code 204 is returned
* If the reservation is already canceled, HTTP status code 410 (Gone) is returned
## Timing/Duration of call
The process can take up to 60 seconds. Therefore, it is advised to set the timeout to 60 seconds or more.

get.description:
## COLLECTING PAYMENTS
## *THIS IS NOT AN API ENDPOINT*
## This is an example for our iFrame payment website to which you can forward your customers for payments directly to Interhome Group.
##
An overview of the allowed payments methods as well their deadlines per sales office can be found in our partner Wiki (http://www.interhome-partners.com/wiki/faq:general:salesoffices_overview) or by the following requests:
- General overview: [https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/salesoffices](https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/salesoffices)
- Specific sales office: [https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/salesoffices/2020](https://ws.interhome.com/ih/b2b/V0100/salesoffices/2020)
In general, Interhome is the merchant of records (fulfillment Interhome). If the client is choosing to pay electronic (rather than by invoice), you are obliged to provide the Interhome payment URL, which you receive in the reservation response.
## Endpoints
TEST: [https://payment-test.interhome.com/payform.htm](https://payment-test.interhome.com/payform.htm)
            
PROD: [https://payment.interhome.com/payform.htm](https://payment.interhome.com/payform.htm)

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description: Template to be used (PSD2 compliance)

parameters.name: Reservation
parameters.description: Your Partner ID

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: Capitalized 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code

parameters.name: Orderdesc
parameters.description: Brief description of the service for which the payment is made

parameters.name: Method
parameters.description: Chosen method

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Capitalized 2-letter ISO 639-1 code

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: Possible Values iRent, IC

parameters.name: Amount
parameters.description: Amount to be payed

parameters.name: URLSuccess
parameters.description: URL encoded callback endpoint can be set by partner

parameters.name: URLFailure
parameters.description: URL encoded callback endpoint can be set by partner

parameters.name: Userdata
parameters.description: URL encoded callback endpoint can be set by partner This parameter can be used to send data to the callback endpoints.

307.description: Redirect to success or failure url

put.description:
## Description
Ratifies a reservation that was originally created as a "short" option and makes it a confirmed reservation.
## Use case
This method must be used to confirm a booking that was created as tentative "short option" (with parameters isOption: true, optionType: short). Unconfirmed "short option" bookings automatically expire after a given time.
## Caching
No

get.description:
## Description
Returns all reservations (including options, cancellations) for the given partner or status code 404 if no reservation are found for your given search.
## Use case
This method is typically used in an extra-net to display the current state of a booking. Additional details for each reservation can be retrieved using the Reservation Read method.
## Caching
Yes. Output must be cached for at least 10 minutes to avoid unnecessary traffic.

parameters.name: AccommodationCode
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by corresponding Accommodation Codes only Important: Multiple Accommodation Codes are interpreted as array list

parameters.name: ModifiedSinceFrom
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by "modified since from". For example, to request only new reservations since last request date. ModifiedSinceFrom can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: ModifiedSinceTo
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by "modified since to" as range. For example, to request only reservations between "modified since from. ModifiedSinceTo can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: ExcludeCancellations
parameters.description: By default, all reservations are requested. True means restricted by only not canceled reservations.

parameters.name: CheckInFrom
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by check-in date.

parameters.name: CheckInTo
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by check-in date range.

parameters.name: CreationDateFrom
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by creation date. Creation date can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: CreationDateTo
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by creation date range. Creation date can be a date or a datetime value.

parameters.name: ReservationStateCode
parameters.description: To set up on reservation list restricted by reservation/ booking status.

get.description:
## Description
Returns data as printed on the "voucher" that customers need to present on check-in.
## Note
Access to this method is limited to selected partners only!
## Use case
Generate a voucher and send it to the client by email.
## Caching
No

parameters.name: reservationNumber
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding Reservation

get.description:
## Description
The method Next CheckIn Date returns the next possible reservation start date within 100 days of the given date for the specified duration and accommodation.
## Use case
Typically used to display the next possible date if the date chosen by the customer is already unavailable.
## Caching
No

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding accommodation

parameters.name: CheckIn
parameters.description: Begin date of search, default is today

schema.description: Begin date of search, default is today

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Duration of stay

get.description:
## Description
Returns the availability information for a given property: all days in the specified range (in which the object is active) in an array, with corresponding codes for occupancy status, arrival/departure day, minimum stay and number of available units.
## Use case
Typically used to display the calendar information on a property details page.
## Caching
No

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding accommodation

parameters.name: RangeFromDate
parameters.description: Range from

parameters.name: RangeToDate
parameters.description: Range to

get.description:
## Description
Returns the availability information for a given property in string format.
Delivers 4 strings for occupancy status, arrival/departure day, minimum stay and allotment (units) where each character represents a single day starting at the specified range from date (or the first day on which the accommodation is active) and ending at the specified range to date (or the last day on which the object is active).
## Use case
Typically used to display the calendar information on a property details page.
## Note
Minimum stays of >26 days cannot be represented in the string format. It is advised to use Vacancy method instead. Important: At the moment, it is not possible to create on request reservations via API. In our Check Price response, you will also see <StateCode>RQ</StateCode>
## Caching
No

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding accommodation

parameters.name: RangeFromDate
parameters.description: Range from

parameters.name: RangeToDate
parameters.description: Range to

get.description:
## Description
Returns all available reservation dates and durations for the selected accommodation. The date range can be restricted with one or both of the optional parameters RangeFromDate and RangeToDate. To select only Trips of a certain duration, the Duration parameter can be set. Note: At the moment, only durations 1-14, 21 and 28 are supported!
## Use case
Typically used to display the calendar information on a property details page.
## Caching
Yes

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding accommodation

parameters.name: RangeFromDate
parameters.description: Range from

parameters.name: RangeToDate
parameters.description: Range to

get.description:
## Description
Returns all possible reservation duration of the selected accommodation including prices, special offers and booking status.

parameters.name: accommodationCode
parameters.description: Selects the corresponding accommodation

parameters.name: SalesOffice
parameters.description: SalesOffice to select prices

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: Currency of the prices

parameters.name: CheckIn
parameters.description: Desired check in date

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language of special offer description. Default is English

200.description: Response returns all possible reservation durations for the specified check in date, with prices, special offers (if any) and booking status (OK/RQ).

post.description:
## Description
The Search method returns all accommodations matching the criteria specified and are still available. The complete result set can be accessed by pagination.
            
To search for accommodations, POST a valid request in either JSON or XML format. The service will respond with all found accommodations for given request in case of success, or error messages in case of failure.
            
The search function provides two endpoints:
- /search is the "default" search endpoint which only returns the accommodation codes and prices. Use this endpoint if the accommodation details (attributes, picture URLs) are cached locally.
- /search/max returns additional accommodation details. Please use this endpoint only if you have not cached the information since the response time takes quite longer.
## Use case
This method is typically used to display a search result page to a client.
## Caching
- Pricing information should not be cached
- When using /search/max, the accommodation details must be cached

parameters.name: PaxSplit
parameters.description: If there are different prices depending on occupancy, the lowest price for the smallest occupancy available will be delivered with this parameter set to true. With value false or without this parameter you get the lowest price for maximum occupancy.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language of special offer description. Default is English

post.description:
## Description
The Search method returns all accommodations matching the criteria specified and are still available. The complete result set can be accessed by pagination.
            
To search for accommodations, POST a valid request in either JSON or XML format. The service will respond with all found accommodations for given request in case of success, or error messages in case of failure.
            
The search function provides two endpoints:
- /search is the "default" search endpoint which only returns the accommodation codes and prices. Use this endpoint if the accommodation details (attributes, picture URLs) are cached locally.
- /search/max returns additional accommodation details. Please use this endpoint only if you have not cached the information since the response time takes quite longer.
## Use case
This method is typically used to display a search result page to a client.
## Caching
- Pricing information should not be cached
- When using /search/max, the accommodation details must be cached

parameters.name: PaxSplit
parameters.description: If there are different prices depending on occupancy, the lowest price for the smallest occupancy available will be delivered with this parameter set to true. With value false or without this parameter you get the lowest price for maximum occupancy.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language of special offer description. Default is English

post.description:
## Description
The Search Prices method returns multiple prices for different accommodations / check-in dates.
All prices retrieved via this method are pre-calculated irrespective of actual availability.
Services are not included in this price.
If a price for a given stay/accommodation cannot be retrieved, it will be omitted in the response. No warning will be given.

parameters.name: PaxSplit
parameters.description: If there are different prices depending on occupancy, the lowest price for the smallest occupancy available will be delivered with this parameter set to true. With value false or without this parameter you get the lowest price for maximum occupancy.

get.description:
## Description
List of exchange rates
The base currency is always EUR.
### Usage
Multiply your EUR value with `ExchangeRate` to get the `ToCurrency` value
            
or
            
divide `ToCurrency`value by `ExchangeRate` to receive EUR value.
### Example
To CZK
            
100  * 25.5 = 2550 CZK

- CR

- OP
- OS
- RQ
- WW
- XX
or empty

AccommodationAttributesEnum.description:
Members:

  • cots

    Baby bed available (up to 2 years)

  • extrabeds

    Extra bed

  • pets

    In this accommodation 1 pet is allowed, but more can be requested. Size (large or small pet) is not defined.

  • pets_max

    In the accommodation a maximum number of pets are allowed. There is no possibility to bring more pets than the max number (no need to request). Please check the value in order to get the number. Value = number of pets allowed.

  • small_pets

    In this accommodation 1 small pet is allowed, but more can be requested.

  • small_pets_max

    In the accommodation a maximum number of small pets are allowed. There is no possiblity to bring more pets than the max number (no need to request). Please check the value in order to get the number. Value = number of small pets allowed.

  • no_pets_allowed

    In the accommodation no pets are allowed.

  • aircondition

    An air conditioning system is a technical facility whose temperature, humidity and air quality of one room can change and preserve

  • bbq

    Grill or barbecue provided (type not specified) or BBQ house available. For private or shared use.

  • mountainbiking

    Routes for the mountain biking sport (riding bicycles off-road)

  • biking_plains

    Biking trails

  • billard

    Billard sport

  • breakfast

    Possibility of taking or ordering breakfast

  • carport

    A shelter for cars with a roof and one or more open sides that can be built against the side of a house

  • central

    The accommodation has a central location. Short distances to shopping areas etc.

  • garage

    Garage is a closed parking space for vehicles.

  • change_linen

    Service - Change linen provided (free or extra)

  • playground

    Children's playground (children can climb, swing and play in the sand)

  • pool_children

    Swimming pool suitable for small children

  • cleaning

    Possibility of room/apartment cleaning (free or extra)

  • cook

    Chef can be reserved, on request

  • parking_covered

    Closed or covered, roofed parking space for vehicles

  • dishwasher

    A dishwasher is a kitchen utensil for the cleaning of dishes

  • tumbler

    Tumble dryer to dry clothes

  • elevator

    Lift in the accommodation

  • themepark

    Entertainment park offers showcases, carousels and other attractions for the entertainment of adults, young people and children

  • fenced

    The property is fenced off permanently from the surrounding

  • fireplace

    An open or closed fireplace/stove in rooms often with fire-glass door

  • fitness

    Fitness room with sports facilities

  • fresh_bread

    Bread roll service garden Different types of garden, meadow or park

  • halfboard

    The half board is the accommodation rate that includes two meals per day (breakfast and either a lunch or dinner per day)

  • pool_heated

    The pool is heated

  • hiking_mountains

    Trails for hiking/walking - sport activity

  • hiking_plains

    Trails for hiking/walking - sport activity

  • riding

    Sport activity. Equestrian facility created for the purpose of accommodating, training or competing of horses

  • whirlpool

    Large tub or small pool full of heated water with jets used for hydrotherapy, relaxation or pleasure

  • maid_service

    Help in household on request

  • massage

    Treatment on the body with pressure (treating injuries and other problems affecting the musculature of the body)

  • metropolis

    Large cities

  • microwave

    Microwave oven heats food quickly

  • mountains_lakes

    Region with mountains and lakes

  • nature

    Region rich on nature

  • nordic_walking

    Fitness walking with specially designed poles

  • oven

    A device used for cooking and baking of food

  • parking

    Parking space for stopping and disengaging a vehicle and leaving it unoccupied

  • patio

    Patio, pergola, porch, sitting area - an outdoor space generally used for dining or recreation that adjoins a residence

  • phone

    A telephone is a telecommunication device which is used to transmit and receive sound simultaneously

  • pool

    A pool for shared use, a structure to hold water and to enable swimming or other leisure activities

  • pool_private

    A pool for private use, a structure to hold water and to enable swimming or other leisure activities

    Tennis is a sport activity. The private tennis courts are available.

    Restaurant is offering drinks and food to consume

  • safe_pool

    Secured

  • sailing

    Possibility of sailing sport

  • sauna

  • single_garage

    Garage is a closed parking space for vehicles

  • smoke_alarm

    The place offers nightlife during the summer season

    The place is suitable for elderly people

  • surfing

    Surfing - water sport activity

  • tabletennis

    Sport activity - also known as ping-pong.

  • tennis

    Tennis is a sport activity. The tennis courts are available.

  • terrace

    Different types of terrace or veranda in the property

  • comfort

    The house is comfortable and cozy furnished

  • historic

    An ancient/historical building, often from another century

  • luxury

    The furniture, infrastructure and equipment of the property is luxurious, very high quality

  • modern

    The furniture, infrastructure and equipment of the property are trendy and stylish

  • rustic

    The furniture of the property is homey and natural>

    The place is suitable for elderly people

  • wlan

  • farmhouse

BrandCodesEnum.description:
Interhome Group Brand Codes

  • Our files and APIs may contain a field called or that you can use to differentiate between Interhome accommodations and properties supplied by 3rd parties.
  • Sometimes not all languages are supported by 3rd party products
  • Some 3rd party products do not support daily prices
  • Photos might have lower quality(sometimes up-scaled)
  • Exceptions for "host to host" content: RetailerBooking method is possible until 32 days before check-in only

Members:

  • ALP

    Alps Resorts

    • standard product

  • AMA

    Interhome

    • standard product

  • APA

    Interhome

    • standard product

  • FER

    Feratel

    • 3rd party property
    • Only limited pricing information available(no daily prices)
    • Prices + availabilities are updated hourly
    • Descriptions available mostly only in languages DE, FR, EN
    • Some accommodations have a minimum occupancy which may cause price requests to fail(error message "Object is not available"). Request prices with maximum occupancy as workaround.
    • "host to host"

  • I

    Interhome

    • standard product

  • IL

    Interhome LIGHT

    • 3rd party property
    • Descriptions available mostly only in languages DE, FR, EN, ES, PL, IT, NL, DA, CS

  • IC

    Interchalet

    • Standard product
    • No possibility for (short) options

  • ICB

    Interchalet

    • 3rd party property
    • No possibility for (short) options

  • ICI

    Interchalet

    • 3rd party property
    • No possibility for (short) options

  • ICV

    Interchalet

    • 3rd party property
    • No possibility for (short) options

  • ICC

    Interchalet

    • 3rd party property
    • No possibility for (short) options

  • ICM

    Interchalet

    • 3rd party property
    • No possibility for (short) options

  • ICP

    Interchalet

    • 3rd party property
    • No possibility for (short) options

  • L

    Lomarengas

    • 3rd party property
    • Only limited pricing information available(no daily prices)
    • No "outside description", all property information is included in "inside" description
    • Descriptions available mostly only in language DE
    • Only Picture type inside even though it might have an outside view
    • "host to host"

  • M

    Interhome

    • standard product
    • No sales in ES and HR

  • NFM

    Interhome

    • Standard product

  • ODA

    Odalys

    • Standard product

  • S

    Tomas

    • 3rd party property
    • Only limited pricing information available(no daily prices)
    • Mostly only translations for DE, FR, EN
    • No possibility for (short) options
    • "host to host"

  • SOW

    Sowel

    • Standard product

  • SPR

    Interhome

    • Standard product

  • SUC

    Interhome

    • 3rd party property

  • TAB

    Interhome

    • Standard product
    • No possibility for (short) options
    • "host to host"

  • Y

    Center Parcs

    • Standard product

  • Z

    Sun Parks

    • Standard product

Following POI's are supported if distance type is "distance": center, golf, lake, public_transport, sea, beach, ski and can be found in DistanceTypeNamesEnum.
If distance type is "distance to airport" you will find the three letter code of an airport here.

(see LastModifiedTypeEnum for details)

LastModifiedTypeEnum.description:
Members:

  • ATTRIBUTE

    Indicating that the available attributes of the accommodation have changed.

  • DESCRIPTION

    Indicating that the description has been newly generated as parts of it has been changed.

  • MEDIA

    Indicating that the pictures of the accommodation has changed. Can also be that new pictures have been added.

  • ACCOMMODATION

    Indicating that the accommodation information of the accommodation has changed. May be description, media, object status, prices, vacancy or wwwcap.

  • OBJSTATUS

    Indicating the internal status of the accommodation has changed.

  • PREPRICES

    Internally used

  • PRICES

    Indicating that price relevant data of the accommodation has changed. Can include for example season Model, pax split, price period any kind of other price relevant data.

  • VACANCY

    Indicating that availabilities or any kind of vacancy relevant date (e.g. Booking rules, quota, pax split...) of the accommodation has changed.

  • WWWCAP

    Indicating that there was a channge of the wwwcap-flag (ready to sell in web).

Main.description: True if photo is the main / preview picture of an accommodation.

Season.description:
Season the image shows.
s: summer w: winter.

Type.description:
View type of the photo.
Inside: photo of the interior .
Outside: view of property from exterior/surroundings.
Place: pictures of local area where object is located. IMPORTANT: these pictures do not show the view from the house or the immediate surroundings but more the local area.
Note: 3rd party properties might have only type inside even though it might have an exterior view.

LastModified.description: Date when the media was last modified.

SortOrder.description: Order of sorting (e.g., for images, sorting is individual per each image type).

Count.description: Shows the number of pictures of the selected accommodation.

ReservationStatusCodeEnum.description:
Reservation states

Members:

  • OK

    Reservation is confirmed

  • OP

    Option booking (expires at given time, ~4 days)

  • OS

    Short Option booking (expires at given time, ~< 2 hours)

  • RQ

    On-request booking, pending confirmation

  • XX

    Reservation cancelled without fees

  • CA

    Reservation cancelled; fees may apply

  • CR

    Booking is just being created (e.g. by agent)

  • ER

    Booking not complete

  • WW

    Pending Internet booking

Babies.description: Booked nr of babies (up to 24 months)

PartnerContact.description: Optional: name / contact info of agent

IsOption.description:
Element must be present. required value: false
Technically there can be true. This is only allowed if it is agreed with your key account manager.

Page.description: Page to set up on result.

PageSize.description: Size of result page (displays 20 accommodations per page, for up to 100 pages).

OrderBy.description:
Sets the sort oder. Sorting
- interhome = default sorting,
- lastbookday = sort by number of bookings,
- age = sort by age of contract,
- averagerating = sort by customer rating,
- price = sort by price,
- pax = number of persons,

CountryCode.description: Country code (as in CH for Switzerland).

Duration.description: Duration of stay (note: to receive all properties, please use 7 as default).

RadiusSearchOff.description:
When searching for places / place codes, the radius search is enabled by default and properties in the vicinity may be included in the search result.
When this parameter is set to true, the radius search is disabled (off) and only properties with the exact place code (or child place codes) are returned.

Count.description: Number of Objects found with the selected parameters.

SubCode.description: Interhome Group internal Sub Service Code.

Count.description:
Amount of allotments.
Eg: XBED, count 2 - could be chosen 2 times. 
Eg: TW, count 0 - no allotments available. If towels are chosen as a service, the service amount will be calculated for the number of pax chosen.

PriceRule.description: Internal price rule code (corresponds to payment Info, see PriceRulesEnum).

Text.description:
If more info available about the service.
Can also be empty.

IsDefault.description: True if service is selected by default.

IsIncluded.description: True if service is included in the price.

IsMandatory.description:
For optional services paid on-site:
This should be presented to the guest.
It will be shown on the invoice.

IsOnRequest.description: True if service is optional on request.

IsCalculated.description: True if service cost is calculated in the final price.

Type.description: Internal type code (corresponds with service Type, see ServiceTypeEnum).

ServiceTypeEnum.description:
2.4.2 SERVICES

Members:

  • N1

    Bookable service on invoice

    Remarks

    Optional service which can be added to the reservation (booked) and will appear in a separate line item on the customer invoice (e.g., Extra Insurances).

  • N2

    Bookable service - no cost

    Remarks

    Included in the price. Can be booked without any additional fee and it will appear on the invoice (e.g., COT: cot). N4 Bookable OnPlace Optional service, payable OnPlace. Optional service which can be added to the reservation (booked), but will not appear in a separate line item on the invoice. The amount has to be paid on the spot directly to the keyholder (example.g.,: XBED: extrabed).

  • N4

    Bookable service - On place

    Remarks

    Optional service, payable OnPlace. Optional service which can be added to the reservation (booked), but will not appear in a separate line item on the invoice. The amount has to be paid on the spot directly to the keyholder (example.g.,: XBED: extrabed).

  • Y1

    Costs on invoice

    Remarks

    Mandatory fee which is added to the invoice (e.g., BG: booking fee).

  • Y2

    In price included

    Remarks

    Services that are included in the total amount without any extra cost for the customer (e.g., EG: energy cost).

  • Y4

    Extra cost on place

    Remarks

    Mandatory fee which has to be paid on the spot (e.g., local tax). Y5 OptionalInResort Optional in resort: optional service, which must be added to the invoice but has to be paid on the spot (e.g., bed linen).

  • Y5

    Optional in Resort

    Remarks

    Optional in resort: Optional service, which must be added to the invoice but has to be paid on the spot (e.g., bed linen).

  • Y6

    Own arrangement

    Remarks

    A service which is NOT provided by HHD and must be organized or brought by the client (e.g., final cleaning in some destinations).

  • XX

    Not applicable

    Remarks

    Used when no service type is necessary

Name.description: Name that appears to the code.

MinStay.description: Minimum stay the special offer is requiring.

MaxStay.description: Max. stay in order special offer applies.

LateBooking.description: Xy days before arrival the special offer is available.

EarlyBooking.description: Xy days before arrival the special offer is available.

SpecialOfferDefinitionTypeName.description: Name that appears to the code

Theme.description: See thematic classification of the accommodation.

ThemeTypeItemArray.description: See thematic classification of the accommodation.

BookingLanguage.description: Voucher language correspond to booking language.

CreateDocument.description: Date when the information of the voucher has been created.

IsRefusedPaxsplitt.description: If this value is true, please note that there are restrictions in regards to the bedrooms, units, floors or annex to use when not booking with the max number of Pax.

Title.description:
Possible values
- 0001 = Mr
- 0002 = Ms
- 0003 = Mr & Ms
- 0004 = company
- 0005 = undefined

CheckIn.description: Next possible check-in date for the requested accommodation.

Duration.description: Possible duration for the check-in date.

VacancyChangeEnum.description:
Indicates if the key can be handed over on that day.

Members:

  • X

    no action possible

  • C

    check-in and check-out possible

  • O

    check-out only

  • I

    check-in only

State.description: Availability Status of the chosen Object during the requested date.

Change.description: Indicates if the key can be handed over on that day.

MinimumStay.description:
Minimum stay (in nights) for the chosen check-in date.
Values usually range from 1-14, rarely > 28 (nights).

Allotment.description: How many units of this type are available/bookable.

MaximumStay.description: Maximum stay (in nights) for the chosen check-in date.

RangeFromDate.description: first day in the vacancy string

RangeToDate.description: last day in the vacancy string

Allotment.description: How many units of this type are available/bookable.

Change.description:
Indicates if the keys can be handed over on that day.
X - no action possible
C - check-in and check-out possible
O - check-out only
I - check-in only

MinimumStay.description:
The minimum stay is represented by a character of the alphabet (A-Z) as follows:
A = Min. stay 1
B = Min. stay 2
C = Min. stay 3
...

MaximumStay.description:
The maximum stay is represented follows:
1 = Min. stay 1
2 = Min. stay 2
...
9 = Min. stay 9
A = Min. stay 10
B = Min. stay 11
...
Usually stays can be up to 28 days ("S")

RangeFromDate.description: first day in the vacancy string

RangeToDate.description: last day in the vacancy string

State.description:
Y = available
N = occupied
Q = on request

PreCheckInLink.description: In order to ensure a smooth and fast process during the journey, it is important that the customer completes the pre-check-in beforehand, otherwise there may be waiting times.

ReferenceNumber.description: Accommodation Nr of booked  holiday home.

OldNref.description: Old Interchalet ref or external ref.

PartnerId.description: Api key needed to access the API. PartnerId: *Your_PartnerId*.
PartnerId.name: PartnerId

Token.description: Api key needed to access the API. Token: *Your_Token*.
Token.name: Token
